name: Fusion Jazz: Tech-1
description:
/* Just act as story was actually implemented*/

Surf the vastness of space to the buzz of sublight engines. Listen to a short music composition telling you about space in its own language.
Feel what it's like to be a small moth in infinitely big space.

Game was made in 8 days for 2022 UNC Collegiate Game Jam.

The Cough Team.
Art - Maxim Apolonskiy
Code - Vladislav Kovalev
Sound, art, code - Savva Krupnitskiy
